code: var handlePending=function handlePending(state){state.isLoading=true;};var handleRejected=function handleRejected(state,action){state.isLoading=false;state.error=action.payload;};var handleFetchContactsFulfilled=function handleFetchContactsFulfilled(state,action){state.isLoading=false;state.error=null;state.items=action.payload;};var handleAddContactFulfilled=function handleAddContactFulfilled(state,action){state.isLoading=false;state.error=null;state.items.push(action.payload);};var handleDeleteContactFulfilled=function handleDeleteContactFulfilled(state,action){state.isLoading=false;state.error=null;var index=state.items.findIndex(function(contact){return contact.id===action.payload.id;});state.items.splice(index,1);};export{handlePending,handleRejected,handleFetchContactsFulfilled,handleAddContactFulfilled,handleDeleteContactFulfilled};
